solution_line_template: First find the area of each long side by multiplying the length and width: {long_side_length} inches * {long_side_width} inches = <<{long_side_length}*{long_side_width}={area_long_side}>>{area_long_side} square inches
Then do the same thing for each short side: {short_side_length} inches * {short_side_width} inches = <<{short_side_length}*{short_side_width}={area_short_side}>>{area_short_side} square inches

Now add the area of one long side, one short side, and one top/bottom together: {area_long_side} square inches + {area_short_side} square inches + {area_top_bottom} square inches = <<{area_long_side}+{area_short_side}+{area_top_bottom}={sum_of_one_of_each_side}>>{sum_of_one_of_each_side} square inches

Now double that quantity because there are two of each kind of side: {sum_of_one_of_each_side} square inches * {num_of_each_side} = <<{sum_of_one_of_each_side}*{num_of_each_side}={total_velvet_needed}>>{total_velvet_needed} square inches
